attributes.action: Deliver Brexit - Take further referendums and Revoke article 50 OFF the table.
attributes.additional_details:
These two options bring further chaos, further uncertainty and the British people want to GET ON WITH whatever deal is to be agreed. We must not go back over old ground. We must not harm democracy.

WHICHEVER party or MP is in control of government, they MUST take the Brexit process forward. 
The people have already voted, they voted to leave the EU. This must be delivered.
attributes.background:
The government has a duty to deliver the result of the referendum. 
We do not want to be asked twice.

The government must :
1)	Take revoking article 50 off the table
2)	Take a second referendum off the table
